content: Home collaborations Expertise and skills Expertise and skills Unlock the power of the Paris-Saclay University research Plug in Labs Paris-Saclay University Discover the laboratories and platforms skill, expertises and technologies from every research field, within a single web portal FIND THE LABORATORY YOU NEED An easy connection tool Detect the opportunities for collaboration using the synthetic content of each laboratory or platform fact sheet and directly contact the research world. A competitive advantage to bring out the future innovations Benefit the strong innovative potential brought by the laboratories diversity and their proximity to companies on the Paris-Saclay territory. Do you need more information? Contact our team at pluginlabs@universite-paris-saclay.fr
